name: Dimension Physics Puzzles
description:
Dimension Physics Puzzles is Hand-Tracking App for Oculus Quest!

At the moment we are developing this application. You will receive all future versions of this game. This is an early prototype.

It includes 5 Puzzles

  • Park a car with a portal
  • Amplify an explosion with a portal
  • Double portal
  • Press a huge button with a small domino
  • Flip a huge domino with a small domino

We're focussed on further evolving our physics based hands to add greater complexety in future puzzles. A new level package is on the way.
